parameter.label: 1: Up output time
parameter.description: Up output time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTime to hold the "up" output button closed (shorted) when unit receives an "up" z-wave command.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.description: Stop output time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTime to hold the "stop" output button closed (shorted) when unit receives a "stop" z-wave command.</p&gt <p&gtNote that the unit will automatically execute STOP, UP or STOP, DOWN when receiving an up or down command.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.description: Down output time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTime to hold the "down" output button closed (shorted) when unit receives a "down" z-wave command.</p&gt</p&gt
